## Install

```bash
# Requires go 1.18>=
$ go install github.com/luisnquin/nao/v3/cmd/nao@v3.1.1
```

## Features

- [x] You know terminal, you know nao
- [x] No need to specify a path to access a note
- [x] Edit from terminal editor
- [x] Encryption
- [x] One writer and multiple readers by note
